source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Learn the art of clay sculpting: Make a Ganapati idol

visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer
visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe

items.headline: Get trained in clay sculpting and make a Ganapati idol without using any mold.
objectives_summary: Learn to make a Ganesh idol with your own hands
Learn the art of clay modeling from ground up
See the joinery and finishing techniques in details

items.title: How Drawing With Sketches
items.headline: Drawing & Art Course with sketches Drawing
objectives_summary: Drawing
Sketches and Practices

items.title: Watercolor Botanical Painting: Peony
items.headline: From sketch to painting - 6 different peonies
objectives_summary: Sketch peonies using photo references
Paint peonies using different watercolor techniques
Paint a peony without using a photo reference

items.title: Short Story Writing For Beginners
items.headline: From Idea to Published Story
objectives_summary: Short Story Writing
Fiction Writing
Writing Skills

items.title: Learn Outdoor Painting with Confidence
items.headline: Plein Air Painting Made Easy
objectives_summary: Paint outdoors with confidence
Mix color outdoors
Assess composition confidently

items.title: How to Draw Perspective for Beginners
items.headline: Learn to sketch 3D objects & environments with these simple step-by-step perspective lessons!
objectives_summary: How to use simple tricks like “overlap”, “object placement”, and “size variation” to create an illusion of depth in your drawings
All the different elements of a perspective drawing finally explained (vanishing points, horizon line, picture plane, etc)
How to use off frame vanishing points to make your drawings look better

items.title: From Acrylics To Oil Painting in 5 Easy Steps
items.headline: How to use acrylic paints to make your step into stunning oil painting easier and more rewarding.
objectives_summary: To learn how to move into oil painting with confidence.
To develop a helpful method to make oil painting easier for beginners.
To speed up the oil painting process without losing impact.

items.title: The Ultimate guide to Sketching People from Life
items.headline: Learn some very simple techniques on how to draw people from life and become a better artist.
objectives_summary: Learn how to draw people from life and drastically improve your drawing skills.

items.title: Acrylic Painting for Beginners: Dreamy Stories Told w. Paint
items.headline: Learn how to imagine, draw, and paint with acrylics amazing paintings in easy steps. Art for kids and beginners.
objectives_summary: The basic acrylic toolkit to get you started | How to create a stay-wet palette to prevent acrylics from drying up
Painting process step-by-step | How to paint in layers | Creating smooth color gradients | Creating depth in paintings
How to find new painting ideas | Imagination-freeing, inspiration-driving exercises | Composition tips and tricks

items.title: DIY LeatherCrafting: Make Your Own Embossed Leather Bracelet
items.headline: Learn step-by-step how to make leather bracelet from scratch from an experienced leatherwork professional
objectives_summary: Produce your very own leather bracelets of different kinds, models and colors
Understand the differences between different types of leather
Use various tools for leather carving, embossing and painting

items.title: Beginners guide to watercolor painting, all you need to know

visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.title: David Walker

items.headline: I will teach you how to paint your own watercolor landscapes and sky paintings step by step FREE, easy style pro artist.
objectives_summary: Produce your own watercolor painting of a beautiful sky landscape,using methods I have developed over 30 years of painting.
Confidently lay down clear water washes and color washes and let them dry properly
You will be able to mix colors on your paper and mix colors on your pallet

items.title: Tips For Blending Traditional And Contemporary Color Theory

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: The ultimate class for developing confidence and freedom to explore color.
objectives_summary: Traditional Color Theory
Tips For Exploring Tries And True Color Combinations
Ideas For Exploring Color Using Arbitrary Hues

items.title: Madhubani Painting Beginners Guide : Indian Traditional Art
items.headline: Learn Watercolor FOLK ART (Madhubani Painting) for Beginner. This tutorial is basic Madhubani Or Mithila Painting.
objectives_summary: Madhubani Painting
Mithila Painting
Madhubani Art

items.title: How to Gold Leaf & Acrylic Painting Ideas Over Gold Leaf

visible_instructors.name: Nancy
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Painter, International Author & Art Instructor
visible_instructors.title: Nancy Reyner

items.headline: Easily apply gold leaf to any surface AND learn best acrylic painting techniques to use with leaf for exciting images
objectives_summary: Apply gold or other metal leaf successfully.
Learn how to combine leaf with acrylic painting.
Achieve special effects with acrylic paint on leaf.

items.title: Watercolor Painting - Easy Beginner Beach Roses Step by Step
items.headline: Watercolor Painting Course step by step for all levels  - Create a lovely Coastal Beach Scene with a charming fence.
objectives_summary: This course is like a PAINT NIGHT online!
This course is not about academics, or color theory, but more about the creative journey.
This course is for all levels of watercolor painters or crafty/creative folks looking to create!

items.title: How to Create Fast and Fun Abstract Paintings
items.headline: Learn how to easily create fun and colorful abstract paintings.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will have completed a fun and colorful abstract painting.
Learn to mix paint with floating medium to create proper paint consistency.
Learn how to create beautiful blended colors.
